import React from 'react' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find(p => p._id === match.params.id) return (
Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Status: ${product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
